reviews.review_msg: Dr Bai was incredibly inspiring, peaceful, calm . She opens you a space of learning and a door to your inner self. You're lucky if you can take her class
Wonderfully caring and honest.  Truly requires her students to think about issues raised in class.

Charles is awesome, not to mention hot. However, has a problem connecting with his students. Many people have said they felt ignored, including myself. But hey, there's one of him and hundreds of us. Basically he should either not talk so much about caring or practice what he preaches. He's quite cold and moody, but very intelligent. I learned much
